text: The Galveston Sand Crabs were a professional baseball team based in Texas. The team competed in the South Texas League, and was an active baseball team from the 1903 season until the 1912 season. The team later merged to create the Galveston Buccaneers. Galveston was home to the Galveston White Caps (1950–1955), Galveston Buccaneers (1931–1937), the earlier Galveston Sand Crabs (1889–1890, 1892, 1897–1899, 1907–1911, 1922–1924), Galveston Pirates (1912-1917, 1919–1921) and Galveston Giants (1888). ==References== Category:Baseball teams established in 1903 Category:Defunct Texas League teams Category:History of Galveston, Texas Category:Sports in Galveston, Texas Category:Defunct baseball teams in Texas
title: Galveston Sand Crabs
